detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected random = uint256(sha3()(block.timestamp)) % 2 (Benchmarks/Study_SamplesSet/7f5c1fd4bbfc11ac43e5996e0ed4fbd6.sol#35):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
